header.heading: Michael Doudy
header.text: I'm an NYC-based software engineer that works at Helbiz.

content: I am a full stack developer obsessed with bringing ideas to life! My specializations are in JavaScript, React, Node, MongoDB, GraphQL, Sass and am constantly adding new tools to my mental database. I currently work in the micromobility industry with analytics and ad platforms. In a prior life, Iâ€™ve had business experience in VR/AR, the indie game dev world, startup ecosystems, and consumer insights.
